attributes.comment:
Dear Director:

I am writing to request that proposed increases to the adoption related USCIS fees
be rejected.
I know of many couples that have ruled out the option of International adoption due
to the high cost.
Aside from USCIS fees, adopting couples pay hundreds of dollars to the State to
have documents certified for adoptions, never mind thousands of dollars to
support infants abroad while waiting for their attorneys to clear international
hurdles before the children can be brought home. I realize other fees are out of the
control of your agency, but nonetheless, I ask you to take the big picture into
consideration.

The financial burden of adoption, international adoption in particular, is already
prohibitive for many.
Please reject fee increases proposed by docket number USCIS-2006-0044.

Sincerely,

Joanne Hughes

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by J Hughes
